sense.def:
Izraz
neither
uporabljamo pred prvo izmed dveh ali več besed ali izrazov, kadar hočemo reči, da dve ali več stvari niso resnične ali se niso zgodile. Pred druge besede v tej zvezi postavimo
nor
.

seg.quote: He spoke neither English nor French.
She neither drinks, smokes, nor eats meat.
The Englishman was neither gratified nor displeased.

sense.def:
Izraz
neither
uporabimo tudi za obe stvari ali osebi, o katerih nekaj povemo v zanikani obliki.

seg.quote: Neither of us was having any luck.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da nekaj
is not the case and neither is another
, hočemo reči, da ni res niti prvo niti drugo.

seg.quote: ‘I don't normally drink at lunch.’—‘Neither do I.’
